name: AInalyst
description: AInalyst is an AI-powered platform built to help users make sense of Web3 — faster, clearer, and with less noise. By combining data indexing, social summarization, and behavioral signals, AInalyst connects the dots between what’s happening, what people are saying, and what matters most. Originally known as Statistr, AInalyst has evolved beyond static research. It is now an intelligence engine built for traders, analysts, and autonomous agents.
